title: Constructivist-Positivist Integrated Model-Based Microlearning for Distance Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online learning platform usage and foundational pedagogical concepts understanding
context.additional_context: Enhancing remote teaching design competencies in social studies for pre-service/in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can explain the principles of distance education design that integrate constructivist and objectivist learning theories.
Learners can plan and implement three or more microlearning activities optimized for mobile environments.
Learners can propose two or more strategies to encourage learner engagement using formative assessment tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
